trans-unit.source: Represents a small rectangular pop-up window that displays a brief description of a control's purpose when the user rests the pointer on the control.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个小的矩形弹出窗口，用户将指针停放在控件上时显示的控件的用途的简短说明。

trans-unit.source: With the ToolTip class, you can provide hints to a user when the user places the pointer on a control.
trans-unit.target: 与工具提示类中，你可以向用户提供提示时用户将指针放在控件上。

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip class is typically used to alert users to the intended use of a control.
trans-unit.target: 工具提示类常用于警报用户控件的预期用途。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify ToolTip text for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control that accepts a name, specifying the format of the name to be typed into the control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以指定工具提示文本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>接受一个名称，指定要在控件中键入的名称的格式的控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: In addition to providing hints, you can also use the ToolTip class to provide run time status information.
trans-unit.target: 除了提供提示，你还可以使用工具提示类以提供运行的时状态信息。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the ToolTip class to display connection speed and line quality data when the user moves the pointer onto a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> control that displays Internet connection status.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以使用工具提示类以显示连接速度和行质量数据，当用户将指针压入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>显示 Internet 连接状态的控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip class can be used in any container.
trans-unit.target: 工具提示类可用于任何容器。

trans-unit.source: To explicitly specify a container, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.%23ctor%28System.ComponentModel.IContainer%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 若要显式指定一个容器，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.%23ctor%28System.ComponentModel.IContainer%29>构造函数。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.%23ctor%28System.ComponentModel.IContainer%29>

trans-unit.source: A single ToolTip component typically is used to create ToolTips for multiple controls on a single form.
trans-unit.target: 单个工具提示组件通常用于为在单个窗体上的多个控件创建工具提示。

trans-unit.source: After you create a ToolTip, use a separate call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.SetToolTip%2A> method to associate ToolTip display text to an individual control.
trans-unit.target: 创建工具提示后，使用单独调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.SetToolTip%2A>方法将关联到的单个控件的工具提示显示文本。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.SetToolTip%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then when the user moves the pointer on a control, the ToolTip with its text is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 当用户将指针在控件上，则显示工具提示，其文本。

trans-unit.source: You can call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.SetToolTip%2A> more than once for the same control to change the text that is associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.SetToolTip%2A>为相同的控件来更改与控件关联的文本多次。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.SetToolTip%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get the text that is associated with a control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.GetToolTip%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取与控件关联的文本，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.GetToolTip%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.GetToolTip%2A>

trans-unit.source: To remove all ToolTip text associations with an instance of the ToolTip class, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.RemoveAll%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要删除与工具提示类的实例的所有工具提示文本关联，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.RemoveAll%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.RemoveAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > ToolTip text is not displayed for controls that are disabled.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 处于禁用状态的控件不显示工具提示文本。

trans-unit.source: Unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.ShowAlways%2A> property is set to `true`, ToolTips are not displayed when their container is inactive.
trans-unit.target: 除非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.ShowAlways%2A>属性设置为`true`，其容器处于非活动状态时，不显示工具提示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.ShowAlways%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip class provides the following properties and methods to modify the default behavior and appearance of a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 工具提示类提供下列属性和方法，以便修改的默认行为和工具提示的外观。

trans-unit.source: Usually the ToolTip is drawn by the operating system, but to customize the appearance of the ToolTip, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A> property to `true` and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> event.
trans-unit.target: 通常由操作系统绘制工具提示，但要自定义工具提示的外观，则可以设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A>属性`true`并处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.ToolTipTitle%2A> class implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider?displayProperty=fullName> interface, which has a single method, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.CanExtend%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.ToolTipTitle%2A>类可实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider?displayProperty=fullName>接口，其中具有一个方法， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.CanExtend%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.CanExtend%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.ToolTipTitle%2A>

trans-unit.source: ToolTips extend controls on the same form at design time, adding a `ToolTip` property.
trans-unit.target: 工具提示在设计时，扩展相同的窗体上控件添加`ToolTip`属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about extender providers, see [Extender Providers](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关扩展程序提供程序的详细信息，请参阅[扩展程序提供程序](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> without a specified container.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref>没有指定容器。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an instance of a ToolTip not associated with any container.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数创建工具提示不与任何容器相关联的实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> class with a specified container.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref>使用指定的容器的类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> constructor enables you to associate a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> with any <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>构造函数，可将相关联<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>与任意<xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>对象。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: By associating the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> in this manner, you hand over control of the lifetime of the ToolTip to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>.
trans-unit.target: 通过将相关联的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>这种方式，你的控件移交到<xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>工具提示的生存期</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: This can be useful if you use several components in your application, and want to dispose of all of them at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 如果你在你的应用程序中使用多个组件，并想要同时释放所有这些，这会很有用。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you associate a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Timer> with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>, calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.Dispose%2A> on the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> will also force disposal of all of these components.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您将相关联<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>，和一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Timer>与<xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>，则调用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.Dispose%2A>上<xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>也会强制释放所有这些组件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.Dispose%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Timer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref> that represents the container of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"> </xref>表示的容器<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ToolTip is currently active.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示工具提示是否当前处于活动状态。

trans-unit.source: With the Active property, you can enable or disable the display of ToolTip text for all controls that have text specified by this particular <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> component.
trans-unit.target: 与活动的属性中，你可以启用或禁用具有指定此特定的文本的所有控件的工具提示文本的显示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>组件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: Although more than one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> component can be created and assigned to a form, setting the Active property to `false` only affects the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.
trans-unit.target: 虽然多个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>可以创建组件，并将其分配给窗体中，将活动属性设置为`false`仅影响当前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: You can enable users to set the value of this property in a form that provides application options.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用户能够在窗体提供应用程序的选项中设置此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: These options, in turn, provide the user with the ability to enable or disable the display of ToolTips in your application.
trans-unit.target: 这些选项，反过来，向用户提供启用或禁用在你的应用程序中的工具提示显示的功能。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the ToolTip is currently active; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果工具提示当前处于活动状态;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the automatic delay for the ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置工具提示的自动延迟。

trans-unit.source: The AutomaticDelay property enables you to set a single delay value, which is then used to set the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutoPopDelay%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.InitialDelay%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.ReshowDelay%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: AutomaticDelay 属性使您能够设置单个延迟值，然后将其用于将设置的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutoPopDelay%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.InitialDelay%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.ReshowDelay%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.ReshowDelay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.InitialDelay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutoPopDelay%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each time the AutomaticDelay property is set, the following values are set by default.
trans-unit.target: 每当 AutomaticDelay 属性设置，默认设置以下值。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Default Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutoPopDelay%2A>|10 times the AutomaticDelay property value.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.InitialDelay%2A>|Equal to the AutomaticDelay property value.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.ReshowDelay%2A>|1/5 of the AutomaticDelay property value.| These properties can also be set independently once the AutomaticDelay property has been set.
trans-unit.target: |属性 |默认值 | |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutoPopDelay%2A>|&10; 次 AutomaticDelay 属性值。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.InitialDelay%2A>|等于 AutomaticDelay 属性值。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.ReshowDelay%2A>|&1;/5 之 AutomaticDelay 属性值。 | 设置 AutomaticDelay 属性后，这些属性可以还单独设置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.ReshowDelay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.InitialDelay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutoPopDelay%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutoPopDelay%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.InitialDelay%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.ReshowDelay%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutoPopDelay%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.InitialDelay%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.ReshowDelay%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.ReshowDelay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.InitialDelay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutoPopDelay%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is typically used to provide a consistent delay pattern for your ToolTip windows.
trans-unit.target: 此属性通常用于你的工具提示窗口提供一致的延迟模式。

trans-unit.source: The automatic delay, in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 自动的延迟，以毫秒为单位。

trans-unit.source: The default is 500.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 500。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the period of time the ToolTip remains visible if the pointer is stationary on a control with specified ToolTip text.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置工具提示保持可见当指针在具有指定工具提示文本的控件上保持静止时的时间段。

trans-unit.source: The AutoPopDelay property enables you to shorten or lengthen the time that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> window is displayed when the pointer is on a control.
trans-unit.target: AutoPopDelay 属性使您能够缩短或延长时间的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>当指针在控件上时显示窗口。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you display extensive Help in a ToolTip window, you can increase the value of this property to ensure that the user has sufficient time to read the text.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你在工具提示窗口中显示了广泛的帮助，则可以增加此属性，以确保用户具有足够的时间来阅读文本的值。

trans-unit.source: If you want to have a consistent delay pattern for your ToolTip windows, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要具有工具提示窗口的一致的延迟模式，则可以设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A> property sets the AutoPopDelay, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.ReshowDelay%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.InitialDelay%2A> properties to initial values based on a single value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A>属性设置 AutoPopDelay， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.ReshowDelay%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.InitialDelay%2A>为初始值属性基于单个值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.InitialDelay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.ReshowDelay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A>

trans-unit.source: Every time the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A> property is set, the AutoPopDelay property is set to 10 times the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 每次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A>属性设置，AutoPopDelay 属性设置为 10 次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A>属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A> property is set, you can independently set the AutoPopDelay property, overriding the default value.
trans-unit.target: 一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A>属性时，你可以独立设置 AutoPopDelay 属性中，重写默认值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum time you can delay a popup is 5000 milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 可延迟弹出窗口的最长时间为 5000 毫秒。

trans-unit.source: For longer durations, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Show%2A> method to control the exact moment when the ToolTip is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 对于较长的持续时间，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Show%2A>方法可控制显示工具提示时确切的时间。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Show%2A>

trans-unit.source: The period of time, in milliseconds, that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> remains visible when the pointer is stationary on a control.
trans-unit.target: 的时间段，以毫秒为单位的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref>时，指针在控件上保持静止时保持可见。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 5000.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 5000。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for the ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置工具提示的背景色。

trans-unit.source: Unless the ToolTip is owner-drawn, this property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 工具提示是所有者绘制，除非将忽略此属性。

trans-unit.source: The system default font is automatically used and can only be overridden by owner-drawing the ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 系统默认字体会自动使用，并且只能重写通过自行绘制工具提示。

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序代码不应调用此方法。对象的<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法过程中将自动调用垃圾回收，除非已通过调用禁用垃圾回收器的终止<xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the ToolTip text associated with the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 检索与指定控件关联的工具提示文本。

trans-unit.source: With the GetToolTip method, you can retrieve the ToolTip text for any control.
trans-unit.target: GetToolTip 方法中，你可以检索任何控件的工具提示文本。

trans-unit.source: If the ToolTip text changes dynamically in an application, you can use this method to find out what text is displayed at any point, depending on the state of the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果工具提示文本动态更改应用程序中，你可以使用此方法以找出在任何时刻，具体取决于应用程序的状态显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: To change the text that a control is displaying, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.SetToolTip%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改控件显示的文本，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.SetToolTip%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.SetToolTip%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> for which to retrieve the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> text.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>为其检索<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref>文本。

trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含指定控件的工具提示文本。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Hides the specified ToolTip window.
trans-unit.target: 隐藏指定的工具提示窗口。

trans-unit.source: The Hide method hides the ToolTip for the specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> if it is currently being displayed.
trans-unit.target: Hide 方法隐藏指定的工具提示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>如果当前显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: It does not disable or otherwise prevent the same ToolTip from being displayed in the future.
trans-unit.target: 不禁用或其他方式阻止在将来显示相同的工具提示。

trans-unit.source: To instead disable all ToolTip windows associated with the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.ToolTipTitle%2A> component, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Active%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要改为禁用所有与当前关联的工具提示窗口<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.ToolTipTitle%2A>组件，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Active%2A>属性`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Active%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.ToolTipTitle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Applications running in partial trust must assert the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow> permission to use this method, as Hide can hide the tip independent of user action.
trans-unit.target: 在部分信任环境中运行的应用程序必须声明<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow>权使用此方法，如隐藏可以隐藏独立于用户执行任何操作的提示。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window"></xref> of the associated window or control that the ToolTip is associated with.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window"> </xref>关联的窗口或工具提示关联的控件。

trans-unit.source: win is .
trans-unit.target: winis .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time that passes before the ToolTip appears.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置工具提示显示之前经过的时间。

trans-unit.source: With the InitialDelay property, you can shorten or lengthen the time that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> waits before displaying a ToolTip window.
trans-unit.target: 与 InitialDelay 属性中，您可以缩短或延长时间的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>显示工具提示窗口前等待。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: If the value of the InitialDelay property is set to a value that is too long in duration, the user of your application might not know that your application provides ToolTip Help.
trans-unit.target: 如果 InitialDelay 属性的值设置为一个值，持续时间太长，你的应用程序的用户可能不知道你的应用程序提供工具提示帮助。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to ensure that the user has ToolTips displayed quickly by shortening the time specified.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于确保用户具有工具提示显示快速缩短指定的时间。

trans-unit.source: The value for this property cannot exceed 32767.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值不能超过 32767。

trans-unit.source: If you want to have a consistent delay pattern for your ToolTip windows, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要具有工具提示窗口的一致的延迟模式，则可以设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A> property sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutoPopDelay%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.ReshowDelay%2A>, and InitialDelay properties to initial values based on a single time value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A>属性集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutoPopDelay%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.ReshowDelay%2A>，和 InitialDelay 属性添加到初始基于单个时间值的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.ReshowDelay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutoPopDelay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A>

trans-unit.source: Every time the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A> property is set, the InitialDelay property is set to the same value as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 每次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A>属性设置，InitialDelay 属性设置为相同的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A> property is set, you can independently set the InitialDelay property, overriding the default value.
trans-unit.target: 一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A>属性时，你可以独立设置 InitialDelay 属性中，重写默认值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A>

trans-unit.source: The period of time, in milliseconds, that the pointer must remain stationary on a control before the ToolTip window is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 时间，以毫秒为单位，，请在显示工具提示窗口之前，指针必须保持静止时控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ToolTip should use a balloon window.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示工具提示是否应使用气球状窗口。

trans-unit.source: By default, ToolTips are displayed using bare rectangular windows.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，使用裸机矩形窗口显示工具提示。

trans-unit.source: By setting the IsBalloon property to `true`, the ToolTip will be displayed using a balloon window.
trans-unit.target: IsBalloon 属性设置为`true`，将使用气球状窗口显示工具提示。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a balloon window should be used; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if a standard rectangular window should be used.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果应使用气球状窗口;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>如果应使用标准的矩形窗口。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ToolTip is drawn by the operating system or by code that you provide.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值由操作系统还是由你提供的代码绘制工具提示。

trans-unit.source: Usually, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> is drawn by the operating system, but to customize the appearance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> you can set the OwnerDraw property to `true` and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> event.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>由操作系统，但自定义的外观的绘制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>可以将 OwnerDraw 属性设置为`true`并处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.IsBalloon%2A> property takes precedence over the OwnerDraw property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.IsBalloon%2A>属性优先于 OwnerDraw 属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.IsBalloon%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both are set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> will be displayed using a balloon window rather than an owner drawn window.
trans-unit.target: 如果两者都设置为`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>将显示使用气球状窗口而不是所有者绘制的窗口。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> is drawn by code that you provide; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> is drawn by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref>提供; 的代码绘制<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref>由操作系统绘制。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a ToolTip is initially displayed.
trans-unit.target: 工具提示最初显示之前发生。

trans-unit.source: This is the default event for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 这是默认事件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The Popup event is raised whenever a ToolTip is displayed, either through an explicit call to one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Show%2A> methods or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> class implicitly displays a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 时显示的工具提示，将引发弹出事件通过显式调用其中一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Show%2A>方法时，或者当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>类隐式将显示工具提示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Show%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event can be canceled.
trans-unit.target: 可以取消此事件。

trans-unit.source: Calling properties in this event that cause the underlying window handle to be recreated, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.IsBalloon%2A>, will result in an exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: 调用此事件中的属性，导致无法重新创建，如的基础窗口句柄<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.IsBalloon%2A>，将导致引发异常。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.IsBalloon%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Removes all ToolTip text currently associated with the ToolTip component.
trans-unit.target: 移除当前与工具提示组件关联的所有工具提示文本。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to remove all ToolTip text that is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> component for all associated controls.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此方法删除与关联的所有工具提示文本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>组件的所有关联的控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: To disable the display of text instead, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Active%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要改为禁用的文本显示，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Active%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Active%2A>

trans-unit.source: To change the text for a single associated control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.SetToolTip%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改单个关联控件的文本，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.SetToolTip%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.SetToolTip%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the length of time that must transpire before subsequent ToolTip windows appear as the pointer moves from one control to another.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指针从一个控件移到另一个出现后面的工具提示窗口之前必须经过的时间长度。

trans-unit.source: With the ReshowDelay property, you can shorten or lengthen the time that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> waits before displaying a ToolTip window after a previous ToolTip window is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 与 ReshowDelay 属性中，您可以缩短或延长时间的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>等待显示工具提示窗口，显示上一个工具提示窗口后。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: The first time a ToolTip window is displayed, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.InitialDelay%2A> property is used to determine the delay to apply before initially showing the ToolTip window.
trans-unit.target: 将显示一个工具提示窗口，第一次的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.InitialDelay%2A>属性用于确定应用在最初显示工具提示窗口之前的延迟。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.InitialDelay%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a ToolTip window is currently being displayed and the user moves the pointer to another control that displays a ToolTip window, the value of the ReshowDelay property is used before showing the ToolTip for the new control.
trans-unit.target: 当前正显示工具提示窗口，用户将指针移到另一个显示工具提示窗口的控件时显示新的控件的工具提示之前使用 ReshowDelay 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip window from the previous control must still be displayed in order for the delay specified in the ReshowDelay property to be used; otherwise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.InitialDelay%2A> property value is used.
trans-unit.target: 仍必须在延迟 ReshowDelay 属性中指定的顺序使用; 中显示的上一个控件从工具提示窗口否则为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.InitialDelay%2A>使用属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.InitialDelay%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to have a consistent delay pattern for ToolTip windows, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要具有工具提示窗口的一致的延迟模式，则可以设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A> property sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutoPopDelay%2A>, ReshowDelay, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.InitialDelay%2A> properties to initial values based on a single time value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A>属性集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutoPopDelay%2A>，ReshowDelay，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.InitialDelay%2A>为初始值属性基于一次值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.InitialDelay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutoPopDelay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A>

trans-unit.source: Every time the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A> property is set, the ReshowDelay property is set to 1/5 of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 每次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A>属性设置，ReshowDelay 属性设置为 1/5 之<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A>属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A> property is set, you can independently set the ReshowDelay property, overriding the default value.
trans-unit.target: 一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A>属性时，你可以独立设置 ReshowDelay 属性中，重写默认值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutomaticDelay%2A>

trans-unit.source: The length of time, in milliseconds, that it takes subsequent ToolTip windows to appear.
trans-unit.target: 时间 （毫秒），它采用后续工具提示窗口，显示的长度。

trans-unit.source: Associates ToolTip text with the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 将工具提示文本与指定控件相关联。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> to associate the ToolTip text with.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>将使用的工具提示文本。

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text to display when the pointer is on the control.
trans-unit.target: 当指针在控件上时显示工具提示文本。

trans-unit.source: Sets the ToolTip text associated with the specified control, and displays the ToolTip modally.
trans-unit.target: 设置与指定控件关联的工具提示文本，并以模式方式显示工具提示。

trans-unit.source: The version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Show%2A> method displays the ToolTip for the specified control modally; that is, the ToolTip will be displayed until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Hide%2A> method is called, or until the parent form is minimized, hidden, or closed.
trans-unit.target: 版本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Show%2A>方法以模式方式显示工具提示为指定的控件; 即，工具提示将显示，直到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Hide%2A>方法调用，或直到父窗体最小化，隐藏，或关闭。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Hide%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Show%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip is positioned in the center of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 在关联控件的中心来放置工具提示。

trans-unit.source: Applications running in partial trust must assert the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow> permission to use this method, as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Show%2A> can control the display and location of a ToolTip independent of user action.
trans-unit.target: 在部分信任环境中运行的应用程序必须声明<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow>权限才能使用此方法，因为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Show%2A>可以控制的显示和独立于用户执行任何操作的工具提示的位置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Show%2A> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the new ToolTip text.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含新的工具提示文本。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> to display the ToolTip for.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>要显示的工具提示。

trans-unit.target: The window parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a ToolTip window is displayed, even when its parent control is not active.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否显示工具提示窗口，即使其父控件处于非活动状态。

trans-unit.source: With the ShowAlways property, you can display a ToolTip window even when the container of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> is not active.
trans-unit.target: 通过 ShowAlways 属性中，你可以显示工具提示窗口，即使的容器<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>处于非活动状态。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: You can use this feature in a modeless window application to enable ToolTip windows to be displayed regardless of which modeless window is active.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此功能在无模式窗口应用程序以启用要显示的工具提示窗口而不考虑的无模式窗口处于活动状态。

trans-unit.source: This feature is also useful when you want to create a control by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>, which contains a number of controls within it that display ToolTip windows.
trans-unit.target: 当你想要通过使用创建的控件时，此功能也是有用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>，其中包含多个在其中显示工具提示窗口的控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> is often not the active window on a form, setting this property to `true` enables the controls within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> to display ToolTip windows at any time.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>通常不是活动窗口在窗体中，将此属性设置为上的`true`使控件内的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>要在任何时显示工具提示窗口。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the ToolTip is always displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果始终显示工具提示;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Stops the timer that hides displayed ToolTips.
trans-unit.target: 停止用于隐藏所显示工具提示的计时器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> class has an internal timer that it uses to set the display duration for ToolTips.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>类具有内部计时器，使用它来设置工具提示显示持续时间。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: The duration associated with this timer is set through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutoPopDelay%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置与此计时器关联的持续时间<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutoPopDelay%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.AutoPopDelay%2A>

trans-unit.source: The StopTimer method will stop this internal timer, causing any displayed ToolTip to be shown modally until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Hide%2A> method is called, or the parent form is minimized, hidden, or closed.
trans-unit.target: StopTimer 方法，将停止导致任何显示的工具提示，直到有模式地显示此内部计时器<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Hide%2A>调用方法时，或最小化、 隐藏，或关闭了父窗体。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Hide%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines how ampersand (&) characters are treated.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，确定如何与号 (&) 字符被处理。

trans-unit.source: An application commonly uses the same string resource for multiple purposes, such as a menu item and a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序通常用于多种用途，如菜单项和工具提示中使用的相同的字符串资源。

trans-unit.source: However, menus often enable accelerators, denoted by an ampersand character, in the menu item string.
trans-unit.target: 但是，菜单通常启用加速器，由一个 & 号字符，菜单项字符串中表示。

trans-unit.source: ToolTips do not support this capability, so by default, ampersands are just displayed as normal characters.
trans-unit.target: 工具提示不支持此功能，因此默认情况下，& 只显示作为普通字符。

trans-unit.source: Setting the StripAmpersands property to `true` removes all ampersands from the ToolTip text.
trans-unit.target: 将 StripAmpersands 属性设置为`true`所有 & 都移除的工具提示文本。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if ampersand characters are stripped from the ToolTip text; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果 & 字符被剥离从工具提示的文本;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is false.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 false。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object that contains programmer-supplied data associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含程序员提供的数据，与关联的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you use the Tag property to store data that is closely associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.
trans-unit.target: 通常，使用标记属性来存储与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>密切关联的数据

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are displaying a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> for a control that displays customer information, you might store the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> that contains the customer's information in the Tag property so the data can be accessed quickly.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您要显示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>的控件，显示客户信息，你可能会存储<xref:System.Data.DataSet>，包含标记属性中的客户的信息，因此可以快速访问这些数据。</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains data about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>，其中包含有关数据<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref>。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that defines the type of icon to be displayed alongside the ToolTip text.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，定义要显示工具提示文本旁的图标的类型。

trans-unit.source: If you want to use a graphic that is not defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTipIcon?displayProperty=fullName> enumeration, you must owner-draw the entire ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要使用未定义的一个图形<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTipIcon?displayProperty=fullName>枚举，您必须所有者描述整个工具提示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTipIcon?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTipIcon"></xref> enumerated values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTipIcon"></xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a title for the ToolTip window.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置工具提示窗口的标题。

trans-unit.source: The title is displayed within the window as a line of bold text above the standard text of a ToolTip control description.
trans-unit.target: 标题在窗口中显示为工具提示控件说明标准文本上方显示为粗体文本行。

trans-unit.source: Typically, titles are only used either to differentiate different categories of controls on a form or as an introduction to a fairly long control description.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，标题是仅用于区分不同类别的控件在窗体上或作为较长控件说明的介绍。

trans-unit.source: The maximum length of a title is 99 characters.
trans-unit.target: 标题的最大长度为 99 个字符。

trans-unit.source: If this property contains a string longer then 99 characters, no title will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性包含的字符串长度然后 99 个字符，则将显示无标题。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the window title.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含窗口标题。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation for this control.
trans-unit.target: 返回此控件的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: This overridden version of the ToString method displays the class name, followed by the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.InitialDelay%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.ShowAlways%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 此重写的 ToString 方法的版本将会显示类名称后, 跟的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.InitialDelay%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.ShowAlways%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.ShowAlways%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.InitialDelay%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing a description of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含说明的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value determining whether an animation effect should be used when displaying the ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定在显示工具提示时是否应使用动画效果。

trans-unit.source: Internet Explorer 5 and Microsoft Windows XP introduced dynamic user interface effects such as window fading and animation.
trans-unit.target: Internet Explorer 5 和 Microsoft Windows XP 引入了动态的用户界面效果，如窗口淡入淡出和动画。

trans-unit.source: If the user has not disabled these capabilities, the UseAnimation property can be used to enable this capability for ToolTips displayed on these platforms.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户未禁用这些功能，可以使用 UseAnimation 属性为工具提示显示在这些平台上启用此功能。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if window animation should be used; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果应使用窗口动画;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value determining whether a fade effect should be used when displaying the ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定在显示工具提示时是否应使用淡入淡出效果。

trans-unit.source: Internet Explorer 5 and Microsoft Windows XP introduced dynamic user interface effects such as window fading and animation.
trans-unit.target: Internet Explorer 5 和 Microsoft Windows XP 引入了动态的用户界面效果，如窗口淡入淡出和动画。

trans-unit.source: If the user has not disabled these capabilities, the UseFading property can be used to enable this capability for ToolTips displayed on these platforms.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户未禁用这些功能，可以使用 UseFading 属性为工具提示显示在这些平台上启用此功能。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if window fading should be used; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果应使用窗口淡入淡出;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。
